All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Deadline
    Deadline is a task that has to be completed by a certain date.
    Duke
    Duke is an application that keeps track of your to-do tasks, deadlines and events.
    DukeException
    A general duke exception.
    EmptyDeadlineDscDukeException
    An exception no description is given to a deadline.
    EmptyEventDscDukeException
    An exception when an event does not have a description.
    EmptyTodoDscDukeException
    An exception when a to-do task does not have a description.
    Event
    Event is a task that happens at certain date.
    InvalidTaskIndexDukeException
    An exception when an invalid task index is given to Duke when checking/deleting tasks.
    NoDateDukeException
    An exception when no date is provided in a deadline/event task.
    Storage
    Storage is where files are accessed and written for Duke.
    Task
    Task is an abstract class from which other tasks are built upon.
    TaskList
    TaskList contains an array-list of tasks.
    TaskType
    TaskType is an enumeration for the different kinds of task types.
    TodoTask
    To-do task is a task that is supposed to be completed in the future.
    UI
    UI is the user interface of Duke.
    UnknownCmdDukeException
    An exception when an unknown command is given to Duke.
